name: MASS (A.E.BASOL)
description:
Controls: ACTIONKEYMove AroundWASD / Arrow Keys
Use Arrow
EPlan Arrow path
QRecall Arrow
R You must return home. Do not let anything stop you from doing so. Try to survive in this space adventure and send your message home!

The resources of the world will not be enough for humanity with a population of 200 billion. Scientists have started a research to find a planet similar to Earth. At the end of their research, they found a planet called Ner in a different galaxy. To go to this planet, they built a spaceship with an engine that opens a Einstein-Rosen Bridge. The destination of the spaceship MASS is NER.

Bora, the ship's security chief, embarked on the spaceship for the future of humanity. Arriving at Ner, the team wanted to send a signal to Earth. When they couldn’t send the signal, they opened a wormhole to return to Earth. Our game tells a story about Bora's troubles in the wormhole.

You can follow this link to learn more about our story.
